personalities.name: Elephants
personalities.description: Need a planned trip. Okay to deviate slightly, but it has to be planned.

notes: Make sure you have the right clothing
Avoid going to high altitude on the very first day of your arrival.
For exploring Sonmarg you might have to hire an addition taxi apart from the one you hired from Srinagar.
issues: Pony and taxi prices being overquoted
overViewMonths.description: Experience the white magical mountains of Sonmarg in the winter

notes: Avoid any high altitude for snow activities on day 1 - get acclimatized well
Check the weather conditions for all your clothing requirements
issues: Roads may be blocked due to heavy snowfall
Few activities may be closed
overViewMonths.description: Manali, located in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh, is a popular tourist destination known for its stunning natural beauty and picturesque landscapes. Winter in Manali transforms the region into a winter wonderland, offering a unique and enchanting experience for visitors.

notes: Avoid any high altitude for snow activities on day 1 - get acclimatized well
Check the weather conditions for all your clothing requirements
issues: Few activities may be closed
Roads may be blocked due to heavy snowfall

overViewMonths.description: Manali, located in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh, is a popular tourist destination known for its stunning natural beauty and picturesque landscapes. Winter in Manali transforms the region into a winter wonderland, offering a unique and enchanting experience for visitors.

staySelected.name: GoStops Manali
staySelected.description: Situated just 400 m away from the city center in the Old Manali district of Manali, goSTOPS Manali can be found near popular points of interest including the Tibetan Monastery, Circuit House, and Manu Temple. From rafting, hiking, and biking to skiing and paragliding there are so many adventures on our doorstep to choose from.

activitySelected.name: Manu Temple
activitySelected.description: Manu temple is located in Old Manali village. It is believed that Manu after the great deluge, first stepped on earth from the celestial boat and this particular spot where he established his abode is the present Manali, which is derived from Manu Allaya, meaning the home of Manu. It was from here that the human race came into being after deluge. The Manu temple is the only temple on the earth dedicated to Manu.

location.address: Himachal Pradesh, Near Manu temple, Manu Temple Rd, Old Manali, Manali, Himachal Pradesh 175131

notes: The auto charges whooping Rs.200 to go to this temple from Old Manali Bridge
The way towards temple has lot of hippie style cafes and Tatto shops. There are many shops selling leather items.
issues: Its difficult for drivers to drive as it has steep road.
Parking issues

activitySelected.name: Rafting in Kullu and Manali
activitySelected.description: Rafting in Manali is an exciting adventure activity that allows you to experience the thrill of navigating through fast-flowing rivers amidst beautiful landscapes. Manali, located in the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh, offers several opportunities for river rafting due to its proximity to the Beas River.

notes: You dont need to know swimming for this activity
issues: During rains, it remain closed
exclusions: If booking only rafting, to & from charges
suggestions: Carry bag to carry wet clothes

activitySelected.name: Paragliding Near Rohtang La
activitySelected.description: Rohtang Wala - Paragliding is a recreational and competitive adventure sport that involves flying a lightweight, foot-launched glider aircraft known as a paraglider.

notes: Bahutich kam time rehta ye saalme
Mast h ekdam karneka ye mauka mila to
issues: Clouds me nahi hota re baba
Any random moment it may get canceled due to weather conditions and situation at that moment
inclusions: Kuch nahi milega re tereko tu paisa bharneka and bhagwan bharose rehneka
Agar pura gadi book kara rahenga to thik h varna vaha paragliding site the kon tera baap pahuchayega kya
exclusions: Sabkuch kabhi kabhi to paragliding bhi exclusion me aa sakta miya

notes: Avoid any high altitude for snow activities on day 1 - get acclimatized well
Check the weather conditions for all your clothing requirements
issues: Roads may be blocked due to heavy snowfall
Few activities may be closed

It is believed that Manu after the great deluge, first stepped on earth from the celestial boat and this particular spot where he established his abode is the present Manali, which is derived from Manu Allaya, meaning the home of Manu.
